comments: very unfair grader, took an exam of hers leaving feeling like I did awesome, knew all the dates, titles, background... got the exam back and received a C-. She takes off points for the tiniest things.
She is a nice lady but completely unfair grader. She expects way to much work to memorize and she never gives partial credit. I wouldn\'t retake her again.

She\'s a very nice woman, but her final exam was very unfair (8 essays, and 2 of them are purposefully on images you have never seen before). She rounds your grades DOWN by not giving half grades (say you deserved a B+, she gives you a B). Which brings your overall grade down. Overall: nice person, but she has a VERY UNFAIR grading system and exams.
Really nice lady. Has flexible due dates. Overall a great teacher

She is a very sweet woman and a very clear professor. She is very straightforward and only tests on things she said in class. There is a midterm, 2 papers, and a final. She tells you exactly which pieces will be on tests, but to do well you have to go to class and take good notes. She is an excellent professor, I would love to take her again.
